headline.print_headline: Woman in Mexico Children's Home Probe Freed Without Charges
headline.main: Woman in Mexico Children's Home Probe Freed Without Charges

docs.snippet: A controversial woman at the center of an abuse scandal at a children's home in western Mexico has been set free after a preliminary probe cleared her of wrongdoing, a spokesman for the attorney general's office said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A controversial woman at the center of an abuse scandal at a children's home in western Mexico has been set free after a preliminary probe cleared her of wrongdoing, a spokesman for the attorney general's office said on Sunday.

docs.snippet: During rehearsals for “King Lear,” John Lithgow gets a poignant reminder of his long past with Shakespeare’s plays....
docs.abstract: During rehearsals for “King Lear,” John Lithgow gets a poignant reminder of his long past with Shakespeare’s plays.

headline.sub: Gaza hospitals strained as casualty numbers rise
headline.main: Gaza hospitals strained as casualty numbers rise

docs.snippet: Gaza hospitals are running low on medical equipment to treat the surge in patients caused by Israel's almost two-week offensive on the Gaza strip. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gaza hospitals are running low on medical equipment to treat the surge in patients caused by Israel's almost two-week offensive on the Gaza strip. Jillian Kitchener reports.

headline.print_headline: It's Simple Really Says McIlroy, Just Process and Spot
headline.main: It's Simple Really Says McIlroy, Just Process and Spot

docs.snippet: For Rory McIlroy the secret of his stunning victory at the Open on Sunday came down to two rather unremarkable words: process and spot....
docs.lead_paragraph: For Rory McIlroy the secret of his stunning victory at the Open on Sunday came down to two rather unremarkable words: process and spot.

headline.print_headline: Congressman's Staffer Denies Guilt in Gun Case
headline.main: Congressman's Staffer Denies Guilt in Gun Case

docs.snippet: A Pennsylvania congressman's press secretary has pleaded not guilty to a weapons charge after Capitol police say he carried a gun into a federal office building in Washington....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Pennsylvania congressman's press secretary has pleaded not guilty to a weapons charge after Capitol police say he carried a gun into a federal office building in Washington.

headline.print_headline: Factbox- 2014 British Open Champion Rory McIlroy
headline.main: Factbox- 2014 British Open Champion Rory McIlroy

docs.snippet: Factbox on Northern Ireland's Rory McIlroy, who won the British Open Championship at Royal Liverpool by two strokes on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: European Security Body Negotiating to Recover Plane Victims-Dutch PM
headline.main: European Security Body Negotiating to Recover Plane Victims-Dutch PM

docs.snippet: Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte said the Organisation for Security and Co-operation in Europe was negotiating with separatists to bring a train containing bodies from the Malaysia Airlines disaster under Ukrainian government control....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dutch Prime Minister Mark Rutte said the Organisation for Security and Co-operation in Europe was negotiating with separatists to bring a train containing bodies from the Malaysia Airlines disaster under Ukrainian government control.

headline.print_headline: French Youth, Police Clash at Anti-Israeli Protest
headline.main: French Youth, Police Clash at Anti-Israeli Protest

docs.snippet: Pro-Palestinian French youth defying a ban on a protest against Israel's Gaza offensive clashed with police Sunday, setting fire to cars, pillaging stores and attacking two synagogues in Paris suburbs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pro-Palestinian French youth defying a ban on a protest against Israel's Gaza offensive clashed with police Sunday, setting fire to cars, pillaging stores and attacking two synagogues in Paris suburbs.

headline.print_headline: Pakistan Military Says 28 Militants Killed in Airstrikes
headline.main: Pakistan Military Says 28 Militants Killed in Airstrikes

docs.snippet: The Pakistani military said it killed 28 local and foreign militants in air strikes in the volatile northwest of the country on Sunday, as evidence emerged that civilians had died in previous strikes....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pakistani military said it killed 28 local and foreign militants in air strikes in the volatile northwest of the country on Sunday, as evidence emerged that civilians had died in previous strikes.
